turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi can you order me a drink from Starbucks please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello I'd be happy to do that. What location would you like me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks at Clarion University in Clarion, PA.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and what drink do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a vanilla latte please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure and can I ask what size you'd like - short, tall, grande, or venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'd like a tall please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and what type of milk would you like in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order whole milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure and are there any special requests/directions for the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No just a standard vanilla latte with whole milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and what time do you want it ready for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd say in about 20 minutes I will pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I will go ahead and order it now and have it charged to your account.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds perfect thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome, let me order and I will confirm for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have ordered your vanilla latte and it will be ready for pick up in 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, confirmation of your order has been sent to your cell phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I just received the text, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, have a good day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too.
